dataIdInfo.idPurp: The Crash Analysis Toolbox was developed by the Bus Drivers development team and Dr. Ghazan Khan, Ph.D Transportation Engineering, to facilitate Dr. Khan's ability to conduct Analysis with the included tools (see Description).
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The toolbox includes the following tools:

CrashNetworkDensity - Creates a network using an existing dataset of crashes (as coordinates) as well as the Open Street Map Network.

CrashRadiusDensity - Creates a bounding circle with a user defined radius around crashes (as coordinates), allowing a user to view how many crashes cluster witihn the user defined radius of a given crash point.
